statements: SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM MarketData WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT date, open_price, volume FROM MarketData WHERE symbol = 'MSFT' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, open_price, volume FROM MarketData WHERE close_price > 100 ORDER BY symbol ASC, date ASC;
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE volume >= 100000 ORDER BY volume DESC, date ASC;
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM MarketData WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT date, open_price FROM MarketData WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT symbol, open_price, close_price FROM MarketData WHERE open_price > close_price AND volume < 50000 ORDER BY symbol ASC, date DESC;
SELECT symbol, AVG(open_price) AS avg_open_price FROM MarketData GROUP BY symbol HAVING AVG(open_price) > 100 ORDER BY avg_open_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT stock_symbol, open_price, close_price FROM portfolio_data WHERE date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, stock_symbol, volume FROM portfolio_data WHERE close_price > 100;
SELECT id, date, open_price, close_price FROM portfolio_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT strategy_name, description, risk_level FROM investment_strategies WHERE portfolio_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, stock_symbol, date, close_price FROM portfolio_data WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY close_price DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, open_price, close_price, volume FROM portfolio_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT strategy_name, risk_level, portfolio_id FROM investment_strategies WHERE risk_level <= 3 ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT id, stock_symbol, date, open_price, close_price, volume FROM portfolio_data WHERE volume > 50000 AND (date < '2023-01-01' OR date > '2023-12-31');
SELECT * FROM market_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_symbol, closing_price FROM market_data WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY closing_price DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM investment_strategies WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100;
SELECT DISTINCT portfolio_id FROM portfolio_performance;
SELECT date, closing_price FROM market_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE closing_price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_symbol, AVG(closing_price) AS avg_price FROM market_data GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING AVG(closing_price) > 50;

SELECT market_data.date, market_data.closing_price, portfolio_performance.returns FROM market_data JOIN portfolio_performance ON market_data.date = portfolio_performance.date WHERE market_data.stock_symbol='AAPL' AND portfolio_performance.returns > 0.05 ORDER BY market_data.date ASC;

SELECT market_data.stock_symbol, investment_strategies.strategy_name, portfolio_performance.returns FROM market_data JOIN portfolio_performance ON market_data.date = portfolio_performance.date JOIN investment_strategies ON portfolio_performance.strategy_id = investment_strategies.strategy_id WHERE market_data.volume > 100000 AND investment_strategies.strategy_id = 3 ORDER BY portfolio_performance.returns DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM market_data GROUP BY formatted_date HAVING total_records > 1 ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_stock_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT date, closing_price FROM historical_stock_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT sector_name, performance_index FROM sector_performance WHERE performance_index > 0.5;
SELECT stock_symbol, trading_volume FROM historical_stock_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'GOOGL';
SELECT portfolio_id, stock_symbol, shares_owned, investment_amount FROM investment_portfolio WHERE shares_owned > 1000;
SELECT stock_symbol, closing_price, trading_volume FROM historical_stock_data WHERE date = '2022-01-05';
SELECT sector_name, performance_index, date FROM sector_performance ORDER BY performance_index DESC;
SELECT portfolio_id, stock_symbol, shares_owned, investment_amount FROM investment_portfolio WHERE shares_owned > 1000;

SELECT prediction_analysis.analysis_id, prediction_analysis.date, prediction_analysis.predicted_trend, prediction_analysis.confidence_level FROM prediction_analysis JOIN historical_stock_data ON prediction_analysis.date = historical_stock_data.date;
SELECT sector_name, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM sector_performance GROUP BY sector_name HAVING num_records > 10 ORDER BY num_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM Market_Data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM Market_Data WHERE open_price > 100 ORDER BY close_price DESC;
SELECT id, portfolio_name, risk_level FROM Retirement_Portfolios WHERE risk_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY id;
SELECT username, email FROM User_Data WHERE age > 30 AND retirement_age < age ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT prediction_date, prediction_text, confidence_score FROM Prediction_Logs WHERE user_id = 12345 ORDER BY prediction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, symbol, date, open_price, close_price FROM Market_Data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, trend_text, trend_score, trend_date FROM Investment_Trends WHERE trend_score > 0.7
SELECT id, portfolio_name, assets, risk_level FROM Retirement_Portfolios WHERE risk_level >= 3 ORDER BY risk_level DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, username, email, age, retirement_age FROM User_Data WHERE age > 30 AND retirement_age < 65
SELECT id, prediction_date, prediction_text, confidence_score FROM Prediction_Logs ORDER BY prediction_date ASC
